Overall good learning experience,

The lesson content and the lesson order are very good. he almost explained everything well.  If you have basic knowledge of react, nodejs  or javascript and wanna be a full-stack MERN developer, I highly recommend studying this course.

The lesson content and the lesson order are very good. he almost explained everything well. If you have basic knowledge of react, nodejs or javascript and wanna be a full-stack MERN developer, I highly recommend studying this course.

results.content: Firstly, I will totally appreciate your efforts in creating something so complicated from scratch. However, as the course moved on, I think you used a lot of functions ,methods and logic which were really complex. There were moments when I was totally clueless about what was going on in front of me. I think before using any component or function for example useState,useContext etc. you should spend at least 5-6 minutes talking about it and about what it does. If not so, at least mention an article or Youtube video or resource from which we can study it and know what is going on. Overall, great content and efforts but a bit more in-depth explanation was expected.
results.content_html: Firstly, I will totally appreciate your efforts in creating something so complicated from scratch. However, as the course moved on, I think you used a lot of functions ,methods and logic which were really complex. There were moments when I was totally clueless about what was going on in front of me. I think before using any component or function for example useState,useContext etc. you should spend at least 5-6 minutes talking about it and about what it does. If not so, at least mention an article or Youtube video or resource from which we can study it and know what is going on. Overall, great content and efforts but a bit more in-depth explanation was expected.
